verses.verse: The burden <WH4853> of Moab <WH4124>. Because in the night <WH3915> Ar <WH6144> of Moab <WH4124> is laid waste <WH7703>, and brought to silence <WH1820>; because in the night <WH3915> Kir <WH7024> of Moab <WH4124> is laid waste <WH7703>, and brought to silence <WH1820>; brought: or, cut off

He is gone up <WH5927> to Bajith <WH1006>, and to Dibon <WH1769>, the high places <WH1116>, to weep <WH1065>: Moab <WH4124> shall howl <WH3213> over Nebo <WH5015>, and over Medeba <WH4311>: on all their heads <WH7218> shall be baldness <WH7144>, and every beard <WH2206> cut off <WH1438>.

In their streets <WH2351> they shall gird <WH2296> themselves with sackcloth <WH8242>: on the tops <WH1406> of their houses, and in their streets <WH7339>, every one shall howl <WH3213>, weeping <WH1065> abundantly <WH3381>. weeping: Heb. descending into weeping, or, coming down with weeping

And Heshbon <WH2809> shall cry <WH2199>, and Elealeh <WH500>: their voice <WH6963> shall be heard <WH8085> even unto Jahaz <WH3096>: therefore the armed soldiers <WH2502> of Moab <WH4124> shall cry out <WH7321>; his life <WH5315> shall be grievous <WH3415> unto him.

My heart <WH3820> shall cry out <WH2199> for Moab <WH4124>; his fugitives <WH1280> shall flee unto Zoar <WH6820>, an heifer <WH5697> of three years old <WH7992>: for by the mounting up <WH4608> of Luhith <WH3872> with weeping <WH1065> shall they go it up <WH5927>; for in the way <WH1870> of Horonaim <WH2773> they shall raise up <WH5782> a cry <WH2201> of destruction <WH7667>. his: or, to the borders thereof, even to Zoar, as an heifer destruction: Heb. breaking

For the waters <WH4325> of Nimrim <WH5249> shall be desolate <WH4923>: for the hay <WH2682> is withered away <WH3001>, the grass <WH1877> faileth <WH3615>, there is no green thing <WH3418>. desolate: Heb. desolations

Therefore the abundance <WH3502> they have gotten <WH6213>, and that which they have laid up <WH6486>, shall they carry away <WH5375> to the brook <WH5158> of the willows <WH6155>. brook: or, valley of the Arabians
For the cry <WH2201> is gone round about <WH5362> the borders <WH1366> of Moab <WH4124>; the howling <WH3215> thereof unto Eglaim <WH97>, and the howling <WH3215> thereof unto Beerelim <WH879>.

For the waters <WH4325> of Dimon <WH1775> shall be full <WH4390> of blood <WH1818>: for I will bring <WH7896> more <WH3254> upon Dimon <WH1775>, lions <WH738> upon him that escapeth <WH6413> of Moab <WH4124>, and upon the remnant <WH7611> of the land <WH127>. more: Heb. additions
